index.heading: Opportunities
index.opportunitySubheading: The Family Office provides clients exclusive access to world-class managers like BlackRock, Goldman Sachs, and the Carlyle Group, offering top-tier alternative investment opportunities.

subheading.unverified: Discover below our unique and exclusive opportunities from around the globe.
subheading.pendingApproval: As a qualified investor you have access to all opportunities offered by The Family Office.

moreCard.title: More Investment Opportunities
moreCard.description: Our exclusive opportunities span over multiple alternative classes like private equity, private debt, real estate, financials and infrastructure.

text.disclaimer: Disclaimer: Past performance is not indicative of and does not guarantee future performance.

tooltip.QualifyToUnlock: You will get access to global private market opportunities in partnership with top-tier managers.

text.title: Opportunities Unlocked!
text.verifiedDescription: <0><1>Thank you for completing your investor profile. We will let you know when we have processed your information. A confirmation email will be sent to <2>{{userEmail}}</2> when the process is completed.</1><3>This may take up to 48 hours.</3></0>
text.unVerifiedDescription: <0><1>Thank you for completing your investor profile. You have now access to our exclusive investment opportunities.</1><2>A dedicated financial advisor will also be assigned to support you when needed.</2></0>
